metrics.name: Rate of Personal Data Changes Initiated by Employee
metrics.signalFragment: SUM ((SELECT COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (WHERE (EVENT_NAME IN ('Personal Data Change WF Initiated'))))) / COUNT (CASE_ID) * 100

metrics.name: Average Time to Approve Workflow Request
metrics.description: Counts the average time from the initiation of a workflow to change personal data by the employee to the approval of the workflow request by the HR department
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
 WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Personal Data Change WF Approved'))) 
- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
 WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Personal Data Change WF Initiated'))))

metrics.name: Average Time Workflow Initiated Prior to Effective Date
metrics.description: Determines how long before the effective date the workflow request was initiated. A negative value means that the record was created retroactively.

metrics.name: Average Time to Reject Workflow Request
metrics.description: Counts the average time from the initiation of a workflow to change personal data by the employee to the rejection of the workflow request by the HR department
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
 WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Personal Data Change WF Rejected'))) 
- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
 WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Personal Data Change WF Initiated'))))

metrics.name: Average Time for Employee to Resubmit Workflow Request
metrics.description: Counts the average time from when a workflow was rejected by HR until the employee resubmits a workflow request
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
 WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Personal Data Change WF Resubmitted'))) 
- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
 WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Personal Data Change WF Rejected'))))

metrics.name: Average Time Completed Prior To Effective Date
metrics.description: Determines how long before the effective date the record was created. A negative value means that the record was created retroactively.

dashboard.name: SAP SuccessFactors - Manage Personal Employee Information

children.name: Average Time Completed Prior To Effective Date
Average Time for Employee to Resubmit Workflow Request
Average Time to Approve Workflow Request
Average Time to Reject Workflow Request
Average Time Workflow Initiated Prior to Effective Date
Rate of Personal Data Changes Initiated by Employee
Data fields that are most frequently changed by HR

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
SUM((SELECT COUNT ("Request Type")
	FILTER (
    	WHERE (EVENT_NAME IN (
        	'Personal Data Updated'))))) 
AS "",
"Request Type"
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE "Request Type" IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY 2

SELECT
SUM(
	(SELECT COUNT(CASE_ID) FILTER (
 	WHERE (EVENT_NAME IN ('Personal Data Change WF Initiated'))))) 
/ COUNT (CASE_ID) 
*100
FROM THIS_PROCESS
